textos_fuente.text: Coral Sands Resort - Palmera Vacation Club Destination A Coral Sands Vacation Features Daily Activities Floor Plan Guest Reviews Photo Gallery Blog Contact Welcome To Coral Sands Resort Explore The Resort Hilton Head Island's Luxury Resort Why stay in a hotel when you can stay in a fully equipped villa with a washer & dryer, entertainment centers, TV's in bedrooms and living room, DVD players, all kitchens utensils and tableware.  Each unit is professionally decorated and refurbished every year. Coral Sands is situated perfectly in the heart of Hilton Head near Coligny Beach.  Perhaps, the finest resort community along the Atlantic Coastline. Hilton Head Island boasts natural beauty along with a playground of outdoor activities. World renowned for it's golf and tennis, Hilton Head also offers a variety of water sports, miles of bike paths, wonderful restaurants and great shopping. Imaginative Lazy River Tropical themed settings and heaps of good old-fashioned family fun. Wi-Fi Resort Whether you want to plan your activities for the week or you just want to stay in touch with friends and family our Wi-Fi connectivity makes it possible. Concierge Service On Site Team of dedicated professionals are there to make your vacation experience a memorable one. Rated #1 Golf Desitnation by Golf Digest* Daily golf greens fees for up to 4 players at Shipyard and/or Port Royal golf courses. Available to Coral Sands Owners only.  Does not include cart fees. Access To World Class Tennis Facilities One hour of tennis for 4 people each day at Van Der Meer Shipyard Spacious Villas Coral Sands offers spacious 1, 2, and 3 bedroom villas.  Each unit is equipped with a full kitchen, washer & dryer, and televisions in every bedroom and living room. Browse Our Gallery Follow Us On Twitter @CoralSandsHHI Hilton Head Condo Vacation I have seen some negative reviews about Coral Sands so I wanted to share my very positive review. My husband and I just stayed at the Coral Sands timeshare and were so very happy... Convenient and Quiet We had a great time at this resort. Do not miss out on renting bikes as that is one of the best things to do on the island. A fully stocked grocery store within walking distance and plenty of great restaurants... Amazing Vacation for my Family Coral Sands was the absolute perfect vacation destination for my family and it all starts with the amazing staff of professionals they employ. As soon as we walked in and until we left they treated us like family making sure we had the absolute best experience imaginable. I would highly recommend Coral Sands to any family looking to get the most out of their vacation... – The Brooks Family (New York, New York) Read  Our Reviews Questions? Send us a message! Sign Up Coral Sands Front Desk: 843.785.1000 CoralSands@erghhi.com 66 Pope Ave. Hilton Head Island, South Carolina, 29928 View Via Google Maps Copyright © Palmera Vacation Club Home Sitemap

A Stay A Table A Tee Time A Gift Breadcrumb Home About Us Meet The Team Meet the Team Passionate & dedicated individuals Led by Hotel Director, Matthew Brend. The Carlyon Bay Hotel is made complete by extraordinary individuals who come together to form a remarkable team. Although our team benefits from their own unique qualities, there is one thing we can be sure of, their passion, warmth and dedication are unmatched. We are proud to be a part of the family-owned Brend Collection and its exceptional reputation for providing fantastic hospitality. Scroll Ali Ennaji General Manager Ali started his career with Brend Collection in 2000. Starting off at The Royal Duchy Hotel, he worked his way up through the restaurant culminating as Restaurant Manager. Taking 18 months to explore and gain experience within other West Country hotels, Ali found himself returning to the Brend Collection at Saunton Sands Hotels in 2011 as Restaurant Manager. Returning to Royal Duchy before finding his feet at The Carlyon Bay Hotel in 2012. Fast forward to the present day, Ali is now General Manager working closely with Directors. Marta Supranowicz Deputy Manager Marta has been a vital part of The Carlyon Bay Hotel for 18 years. First making her debut in 2005 as a waitress in the Bay View Restaurant. Marta quickly worked her way up to Restaurant Supervisor before joining the Management team in 2008 undertaking training throughout all departments of the hotel. This grounding along with her engaging personality, exceptional customer service and her ethos of hard-working led her to become Deputy Hotel Manager in 2016. Holly Balanici Senior Assistant Manager Joining the hotel in 2017 as a Lounge Bar Assistant, Holly's natural leadership qualities and strong customer service skills soon led to her promotion to Junior Assistant Manager. Having gained her Level 4 Hospitality Management Apprenticeship with Brend Collection and HIT Training in 2019, Holly progressed to become a full-time Assistant Manager at the hotel before setting her sights on becoming a manager at the Golf Club. In 2021 Holly decided it was time to return to the hotel taking on the role of Senior Assistant Manager. Natasha Vincent Reservations Manager Natasha started working in reception in 1989 as part of the hotel’s YTS scheme. Over the years, Natasha has become a familiar face for many of our regular guests. Working her way through various roles with the department, her vast knowledge of The Carlyon Bay Hotel helped her acquire the title of Reservations Manager. Gabriel Creanga Lounge Bar Manager Joining the hotel in 2016, Gabriel took over as Lounge Bar Manager in May 2021. You’ll find Gabriel always getting to know our guests whilst delivering exceptional service. Gabriel is the epitome of both the friendliness & professionalism of the Carlyon Bay Hotel, always greeting guests with the warmest of welcomes. Alin Balanici Restaurant Manager Alin rejoined The Carlyon Bay Hotel in 2024 as Restaurant Manager, after spending two years broadening his experience. He now brings his expertise back to us, offering outstanding service to both our overnight guests and those visiting for the day. Whether it's a warm greeting in the morning or a friendly welcome in the evening, Alin ensures every guest feels valued. He also plays a key role in training new team members, instilling the same warmth and charisma that defines The Carlyon Bay Hotel experience. Sean Dalton Head Porter After leaving the hospitality industry, Sean returned to The Carlyon Bay Hotel in 2018 as a Porter, before quickly taking over as Head Porter. As a porter, you’re the first and last point of contact for customers, and we couldn’t think of a better person to leave a lasting impression on our guests. Always ensuring guest expectations are not only met but exceeded, you will find Sean always willing to go the extra mile to ensure our guests have the best stay possible. Working closely with the reception and housekeeping teams, Sean is a well-regarded and vital member of the Carlyon Bay team. Jemma Taylor Head Housekeeper Jemma has been with the hotel for over 15 years, taking on the role of Head Housekeeper in 2022. Jemma’s bubbly personality radiates throughout the department, inspiring to keep her team motivated and passionate about what they do. Jemma leads the way when it comes to exceptionally high standards ensuring that the cleanliness of The Carlyon Bay remains one of the many highlights of guests' stay. Kathy Heyward Assistant Manager Kathy has been with The Carlyon Bay Hotel since 2010. Starting as a receptionist, the next natural step for Kathy to take was to become an Office Manager which led her to being part of the hotel's management team in 2014. Bringing her knowledge from all departments, Kathy’s smile and warm personality complements the friendly welcome that The Carlyon Bay is known for. Rose Underwood Assistant Manager Rose joined The Carlyon Bay Hotel in 2020, bringing her bubbly and friendly personality as well as her vast experience. Rose has proved a success within the team, working closely with all departments and never shying away from hard work. Rose is always keen to learn and has also been warmly welcomed at other hotels within the Collection when assistance has been required. Simon Brown Head Chef Simon has been putting his culinary skills to the test at Brend Collection nearing 35 years. After learning the trade at Camborne College, Simon sought out a kitchen to call his own as he advanced his skills landing himself a position at The Devon Hotel before making the transition to The Carlyon Bay Hotel. Simon is an integral part of the team and is a great asset to the hotel culminating in his current role as Head Chef. More from Carlyon Bay Hotel Luxury Accommodation With 86 luxury rooms to choose from you’ll be spoilt for choice, with first-class furnishings, stylish decor, and many with breathtaking sea views over the Bay. All our rooms boast en suite, free WIFI, free parking, complimentary round of golf, free use of our leisure facilities and spa, LDC TV with Sky Sports & Freeview, luxury toiletries from Gilchrist & Soames. Find out more Award-Winning Dining Savour award-winning cuisine in your choice of our two restaurants, our fine dining experience is hard to forget with amazing sea views and impeccable Cornish cuisine, you’ll find yourself coming back for more, time and time again. Find out more Spa Discover sheer luxury and blissful pampering at this ultimate Cornwall hotel and spa. Our team of expert therapists take a holistic approach, with each treatment individually tailored to enhance your sense of wellbeing. Find out more Golf in Cornwall Cornwall is a magnet for golfers and our outstanding championship golf course makes us the premier golf hotel in Cornwall – and one of the very finest in the UK. Use of this superb course is complimentary for guests of our hotel and our highly experienced PGA professionals will be able to give you all the advice you need to get maximum enjoyment from your round. Find out more Subscribe to our mailing list and never miss another update Be the first to receive exclusive offers, dining experiences, event invites, and the latest hotel news and updates. Email POSTCODE By signing up you agree to receive special offers and promotional emails from Carlyon Bay Hotel & Spa. Coral Sands Inn, Ormond Beach (updated prices 2025) Skip to main content ARS List your property Register Sign in Stays Flights Car rental Attractions Airport taxis More Check-in date — Check-out date 2 adults · 0 children · 1 room Search Home Hotels All resorts United States Florida (FL) Ormond Beach Coral Sands Inn (Resort) (US) Deals Overview Info & prices Facilities House rules The fine print Guest reviews (1,314) More Reserve We Price Match Beachfront Coral Sands Inn Coral Sands Inn 1009 Ocean Shore Boulevard, Ormond Beach, FL 32176, United States Excellent location – rated 9.4/10! (score from 1315 reviews) Real guests • Real stays • Real opinions – Excellent location – show map +27 photos Scored 8.8 8.8 Rated excellent Excellent 1,314 reviews Facilities 8.6 Cleanliness 8.9 Comfort 9.0 Value for money 9.0 Location 9.4 Total 8.8 Free Wifi 8.8 9.0 9.0 Top-rated beach nearby Top-rated beach nearby About this property Featuring an outdoor pool and beach access, this hotel is on the shores of the Atlantic Ocean and less than 10 miles from the Daytona Beach Boardwalk. An outdoor heated pool and free Wi-Fi are provided.

A microwave and a small refrigerator are in every room at the Coral Sands Oceanfront Resort. The air-conditioned rooms are decorated with tropical tones and wood accents.

After a day at the beach, guests at the Oceanfront Coral Sands Resort can enjoy a meal at the barbecue facilities. A laundromat and a 24-hour front desk are available for added convenience.

The Daytona International Speedway is 10 miles from the resort. The Ponce de Leon Inlet Lighthouse & Museum is less than 18 miles from the property. Shopping and dining on Daytona's Main Street are just a 14 minute-drive from the resort. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.4 for a two-person trip. How does it work? 1 It starts with a booking It starts with a booking The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property. 2 Followed by a trip Followed by a trip When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more. 3 And finally, a review And finally, a review After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site. If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.
